  Validate that an IP address is private (RFC1918 / IPv6 ULA).
---

# function: private_ip

Returns true when the input IP address is a private IPv4 (RFC1918) or IPv6 ULA (fc00::/7).

## Example Usage

```terraform
locals {
  ips = [
    "10.0.0.1",
    "172.16.0.1",
    "192.168.1.1",
    "fd00::1",
  ]
}

output "private_ip_example" {
  value = [
    for ip in local.ips : {
      ip    = ip
      valid = provider::validatefx::private_ip(ip)
    }
  ]
}
```

## Signature

<!-- signature generated by tfplugindocs -->
```text
private_ip(value string) bool
```

## Arguments

<!-- arguments generated by tfplugindocs -->
1. `value` (String, Nullable) String value to validate.
